member.summary: Are platform invoke methods allowed.

member.summary: Is unsafe code allowed.

member.name: M:Trivial.CodeSecurity.ICodeSecurityValidator.IsAssemblyReferenceAllowed(Trivial.CodeSecurity.Reference.AssemblyReference)
member.summary: Is the specified assembly reference allowed.
member.returns: True if the assembly reference is allowed or false if not (Fail verification)

member.name: M:Trivial.CodeSecurity.ICodeSecurityValidator.IsNamespaceReferenceAllowed(Trivial.CodeSecurity.Reference.TypeReference)
member.summary: Is the specified namespace reference allowed. Note that the named type reference is passed for context but only the namespace should be checked.
member.param: A reference to a named type
member.returns: True if the namespace is allowed or false if not (Fail verification)

member.name: M:Trivial.CodeSecurity.ICodeSecurityValidator.IsMemberReferenceAllowed(Trivial.CodeSecurity.Reference.MemberReference)
member.summary: Is the specified member reference allowed. Note that the provided member reference can be cast to or .
member.returns: True if the member is allowed or false if not (Fail verification)
